description: Quick test requests for Showcase Apps API

requests.name: Health Check
requests.description: Check if API server is running

body.query: { apps { _id title slug shortDesc longDesc status visibility releaseDate platforms languages tags website repository demoUrl downloadUrl appStoreUrl playStoreUrl viewCount likeCount createdAt updatedAt } }

requests.name: Get Apps with Filters

body.query: query GetApps($platforms: [String!], $tags: [String!]) { apps(platforms: $platforms, tags: $tags) { _id title slug platforms tags } }

requests.description: Get apps filtered by platforms and tags

body.query: { timelineEvents { _id title description type date isPublic } }

requests.name: Test Web Proxy
requests.description: Test GraphQL through web app proxy

requests.name: Get Query Types

body.query: { __type(name: "Query") { fields { name args { name type { name } } } } }

requests.description: Get available query types and arguments

body.query: mutation CreateApp($input: CreateAppInput!) { createApp(input: $input) { _id title slug } }

input.title: Test App
input.longDesc: This is a test application for API testing

curlExamples.name: Basic Apps Query
curlExamples.command: curl -X POST http://localhost:4000/graphql -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"query": "{ apps { _id title slug } }"}'

curlExamples.name: Apps with Variables
curlExamples.command: curl -X POST http://localhost:4000/graphql -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"query": "query GetApps($platforms: [String!]) { apps(platforms: $platforms) { _id title } }", "variables": {"platforms": ["web"]}}'

curlExamples.name: Web Proxy Test
curlExamples.command: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/graphql -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"query": "{ apps { _id title slug } }"}'
